meanings.definition: Existing or occurring before the development of electronic technology.
meanings.sent1: The preelectronic machinery relied on manual operation.
meanings.sent2: In the preelectronic era, people communicated through letters and telegrams.
meanings.sent3: The preelectronic gadgets seemed like ancient relics to the tech-savvy kids.
meanings.sent4: Her preelectronic knowledge of computers was as outdated as using a quill pen.
meanings.sent5: The preelectronic world was filled with mechanical wonders and analog marvels.

meanings.definition: Relating to a time period prior to the widespread use of electronic devices.
meanings.sent1: Their preelectronic home had no smartphones or tablets.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various preelectronic artifacts from the early 20th century.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa's preelectronic stories about life without computers always made us chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The preelectronic lifestyle felt like a distant dream in the modern age.
meanings.sent5: The preelectronic society thrived on simpler ways of living and interacting.
